DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess nausea severity response four different drug dose strategy Duloxetine ( 30 mg food , 60 mg food , 30 mg without food , 60 mg without food ) Korean patient major depressive disorder ( MDD ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Duloxetine Dosing Strategy Study Korean Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
